channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Christmas Stars
channel.desc: When aspiring R&B artist Layla crosses paths with amateur songwriter Spence, she thinks she's found her shot at finally getting a record deal.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Never Been Chris'd
channel.desc: A complex love triangle forms after best friends Naomi and Liz head home for Christmas and reconnect with their secondary-school crush, Chris.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: A Perfect Christmas Carol
channel.desc: Christmas-hating chef Carol only agrees to go to her boyfriend's home for the holidays so she can find out his mum's biscuit recipe, but then the festive magic starts to get to her.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: The Christmas Quest
channel.desc: When an archaeologist begins a search for an ancient Christmas treasure, she must team up with her ex-husband - who is an expert in Nordic languages - to find it.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Magic In Mistletoe
channel.desc: After best-selling author Harrington's social media comments ruffle feathers, publicist April's damage control plan means spending Christmas together.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: A Christmas Star
channel.desc: An astronomer predicts that a new meteor shower will appear over a tiny town. Can she convince the locals to help with her discovery at the expense of a Christmas tradition.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Holiday Heritage
channel.desc: Join Ella, her mum and her grandma in this countdown-to-Christmas romcom, as three generations celebrate two holidays - Christmas and Kwanzaa - as one family.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Deck The Walls
channel.desc: Interior designer, Rose DeMonte, uses her skills back in her hometown to renovate a Christmas Charity Home for her brother Sal and his contractor Brysen's home flipping company.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: A Lot Like Christmas
channel.desc: The owner of the most popular Christmas tree lot in Hudson Springs finds her business in jeopardy when a big-city marketing executive arrives with a chain store. Seasonal romance.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Twas The Night Before Christmas
channel.desc: Eager to break into directing, former actress Madison takes charge of a town's annual Christmas Eve play.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: A Novel Noel
channel.desc: A book editor takes on a temporary gig running a bookstore, where her battles with the owner's son allow her to rediscover her passion for nurturing creativity.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: The Santa Summit
channel.desc: During her hometown's annual Santa Summit, in which revellers dress up as Father Christmas, Jordin meets the man of her dreams, before he is whisked away by a sea of Santas.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Christmas Under The Lights
channel.desc: Emily reluctantly returns home to her family's rescue ranch to organise the Christmas Carnival to honour her mother, meeting a handsome artist along the way.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Sincerely Truly Christmas
channel.desc: When a Christmas wish goes wrong and Christina starts hearing what gifts everyone wants, she learns that getting a one-hit wonder to make music again could make lots of people happy.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Christmas CEO
channel.desc: The CEO of a small toy company gets a once in a lifetime offer to merge with a huge toy company, but needs her estranged ex-business partner's signature to seal the deal.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: The Finnish Line
channel.desc: Inspired by her father's legacy, Anya enters Finland's Joulurauha race. Partnered with a new dog, she faces challenges, her father's rival and her own anxieties.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: The Christmas Brew
channel.desc: While buying a small brewery, Tori falls for the owner - and the town's tight-knit community. When she discovers her boss plans to bankrupt it, she sets out to save the business.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Ghosts Of Christmas Always
channel.desc: Katherine is a Ghost of Christmas Present and she must help one soul, Peter, rediscover his Christmas spirit. But this year has something unusual in store.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Debbie Macomber's Joyful...
channel.desc: Mrs Miracle uses Christmas magic to reunite three siblings who must decide who will inherit the family's real estate empire after their grandmother's passing.

channel.title: Haunted Wedding
channel.desc: The wedding between ghost hunters Jane and Brian at a haunted inn is disrupted by Angelique - a ghost who mistakes Brian for her own dead fianc?.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: The Attraction Test
channel.desc: After being called out during the launch of her landmark study on love, an acclaimed professor is forced to take her own dating test with the man who criticised it.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: A Case For the Winemaker
channel.desc: When a friend's winery sees a murder, Ainsley's crime-solving skills prove invaluable as she teaches criminology and investigates the case.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Sparks Over Brooklyn
channel.desc: Single chef Lidia sees her future plans fall apart when arrogant tech innovator Danny buys her restaurant and plans to completely remodel it. Can she convince him that less is more.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: 3 Bed, 2 Bath, 1 Ghost
channel.desc: New real estate agent Anna has a beautiful listing. The only problem: it has a ghost in residence who is convinced she cannot pass over until Anna gets back together with her ex.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Love In The Maldives
channel.desc: A travel writer goes to the Maldives to write a piece about a legendary shipwreck. But with the help of her underwater guide, she may discover true love instead of buried treasure.

channel.desc: When a diehard romantic sets the date for her wedding despite being single, she sets out on a quest to find a fianc?. But could true love actually be right under her nose.

channel.desc: After inheriting her grandmother's winery in Napa Valley, Cassandra takes a sabbatical to renovate the property with the help of handsome local, Alec.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Love On Your Doorstep
channel.desc: Love starts to bloom between a talented TV host and a florist with a groundbreaking flower delivery app as they work on a new, primetime TV show.

channel.title: Falling In Love In Niagara
channel.desc: When her fianc? leaves her right before the wedding, Madeline goes to Niagara Falls for her honeymoon without him. Can she find new love alongside her adventurous side.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Signs Of Your Heart
channel.desc: As a single mother to her deaf son, Allie does not have much time to go out on dates. But when a handsome new tenant moves in, it looks like love has arrived at her doorstep.
